title: Pixel 4a frozen on G start up screen. Won't turn off until battery goes flat. restart doesn't work
content:
Pixel 4a frozen on G start up page for 24 hours at this point. G screen frozen until battery goes flat with download bar visible below G. Phone when recharged stays the same as mentioned above.
Tried to restart phone holding power button. Goes blank, google screen then frozen on G screen with download bar visible
Thanks
